message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this exceptional product to you. It's not just an item; it's a valuable asset that could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and high quality, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its true worth, I am offering it to you for $12000. This price reflects not only the cost of the product but also the potential value it can bring to you. I trust you'll find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing how it can benefit you.
